name: Debt Escape
description:
Description:

You are playing Jon, an alcoholic trying to get out of debt

You had a job interview, but suddenly gas spread around the room!

You're knocked out! You wake up completely alone and venture through the dark and empty building..

Install Instructions:

  1. Download the .zip file
  2. Unzip the folder
  3. Run the game
  4. Escape!

Credits:

Game Development: Ilias 4A

Art/Assets: Ilias 4A, with a bit of help from Kim and MadHoundGames props (accounts for a little less than 10% of all assets)

UI: Ilias 4A

Music/Sounds: Ilias 4A
